channel.title: Data Center on My blog

item.title: VSAN - The Unspoken Future
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: This rather tongue-in-cheek title, is a play on Maish recent VSAN - The Unspoken Truth post where he highlights what he thinks is one of the hidden «problems» with the current version of VSAN is it’s inherent non-blade compatibility and current lack of «rack based VSAN ready nodes». Of course, this is a reality; If you base your current infrastructure on blade servers, VSAN probably isn’t a good match as it stands today.
